- Multiple layered gradients
- Polygon clip-paths that change per slide
- Blur filter for soft, glowing appearance
- Smooth transitions using CSS

--- theme: default highlighter: shiki lineNumbers: false info: | ## Athlead Seed Round Pitch Deck AI-Powered Athletic Recruiting & Livestreaming Platform drawings: persist: false transition: slide-left title: Athlead - Seed Round Pitch mdc: true layout: cover class: text-center ---

Athlead

AI-Powered Athletic Recruiting & Livestreaming

Where every athlete gets discovered.
Where coaches find perfect-fit talent.

Pre-Beta | Seed Fundraising

--- layout: default --- # The Problem ## The $4.7B Problem in Youth Sports
Athletes & Families
Spend 100+ hours on manual recruiting tasks annually
Pay $5K-$15K/year for club sports with no guarantees
Navigate 50+ fragmented platforms with no unified solution
98% never get recruited due to lack of visibility
"We're spending more time on recruiting than practicing."
— Parent of D2 Athlete
College Coaches
Review 1,000+ athletes to find 10 recruits
Travel 200+ days/year with diminishing ROI
70% still use spreadsheets — outdated workflow
Limited to 5-state radius, missing national talent
"If you could save me 5 hours per week, I'm in."
— D2 Volleyball Coach
--- layout: default --- # Why Now? ## The Perfect Storm
### 1. Transfer Portal Explosion
100x
**1,000+ transfers** in 2024
vs. 10 five years ago
Creates recruiting chaos. Coaches need better discovery tools. Search is manual and painful.
### 2. AI Technology Matured
90%↓
**Inference costs** dropped
in 18 months
AI agent frameworks production-ready. Vector databases enable matching at scale. Now economically viable.
"The market is shifting, the tech is ready, and there's a 10-year incumbent gap."
--- layout: default --- # The Solution
"LinkedIn and TikTok had a baby focused on college recruiting."
Athlead.AI
AI-Native Recruiting Platform + Social Hub
✓
AI Matching
Perfect-fit college recommendations
✓
One-Tap Streaming
Live games to coach eyeballs
✓
Social Feed
Community & peer discovery
--- layout: default --- # How It Works ## The Five-Step User Journey ```mermaid %%{init: {'theme':'dark', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor':'#3b82f6','primaryTextColor':'#fff','primaryBorderColor':'#60a5fa','lineColor':'#60a5fa','secondaryColor':'#1e40af','tertiaryColor':'#1e3a8a'}}}%% graph LR A[Athlete Signs Up] --> B[Goes Live] B --> C[AI Matches Colleges] C --> D[Coaches Discover] D --> E[Families Watch] style A fill:#3b82f6,stroke:#60a5fa,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff style B fill:#3b82f6,stroke:#60a5fa,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff style C fill:#3b82f6,stroke:#60a5fa,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff style D fill:#3b82f6,stroke:#60a5fa,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff style E fill:#3b82f6,stroke:#60a5fa,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff ```
1
Sign Up
Create profile
in 2 minutes
2
Go Live
One tap to
stream games
3
AI Matches
Perfect-fit
colleges
4
Coaches Find
Live talent
discovery
5

Never miss
a moment
### For Student-Athletes - Centralized Dashboard - AI College Matching - Recruiting Timeline & Guidance - Social Athlete Profile - AI-assisted Communication - Social Community
### For College Coaches - Intelligent Discovery - Pipeline Management Dashboard - AI-Powered Prospect Intelligence - Communication Automation - Video Scouting Hub - AI Compliance Agent - **Target: 40%+ time savings**
### For Parents/Families - Progress Monitoring Dashboard - Guidance Library - Alert System - Shared Collaboration
--- layout: default --- # Competitive Advantage ## AI-Native in a Legacy Market
### The Moat
Built 2025
AI-first architecture
vs. retrofitting AI to legacy platforms
Incumbents built 1997-2015. Rebuilding from scratch takes **3-5 years**. We have that advantage baked in.
### Simple Comparison
| | Athlead | NCSA | |---|---|---| | **AI Matching** | ✓ Agentic | ✗ None | | **Livestreaming** | ✓ One-tap | ✗ None | | **Social Feed** | ✓ Mobile-first | ✗ Web-only | | **Founded** | 2025 | 1997 |
"Why can't NCSA just copy this?"

They're retrofitting. We're native.
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # Product Demo ## See It in Action
Athlete Mobile App
  • ✓ Create profile in 2 minutes
  • ✓ Browse personalized college recommendations
  • ✓ Social feed with peers' recruiting wins
  • ✓ One-tap livestream button
  • ✓ Centralized coach messages
Coach Platform
  • ✓ Search and filter athletes
  • ✓ Pipeline dashboard (prospects at each stage)
  • ✓ Video player (live + archived footage)
  • ✓ Prospect intel (comp players, fit score)
  • ✓ Bulk messaging with AI variations
Athlead.TV
  • ✓ Live game streaming
  • ✓ Chat/engagement (coaches, families, peers)
  • ✓ Automatic archiving to athlete profile
  • ✓ Highlight reel generation
"Athletes create a recruiting profile in less time than it takes to write one email.
Coaches discover talent without leaving their desk."
--- layout: default --- # Traction & Validation ## Validated Problem + Solution
Research Completed
50+ coaches interviewed
(all division levels)
100+ families validated
(confirmed frustration)
Early Testing
✓ Beta testing with local families
✓ 3 pilot clubs lined up
✓ Q3 2025 launch ready
Market Signal
NCSA retention declining 15% YoY
Transfer searches 100x growth
20+ year sports network
Strong validation: coaches want this, families need this, market is ready.
--- layout: default --- # Business Model ## Three Revenue Streams
Athletes
Free → $15/month
Free tier: Profile + social
Paid: AI matching + livestreaming
1,000s paying
Coaches
Free → $50/month
Free: Search + view profiles
Pro: AI suite + automation
100-500 per school
Fans
$8-15/month
Follow athletes livestreaming
Secondary but profitable
Family engagement
Coach CAC
$15
Influencer-driven
Coach LTV
$500
Annual value
LTV/CAC
5-10x
SaaS standard
--- layout: default --- # Go-to-Market Strategy ## Clear Path to Scale ```mermaid %%{init: {'theme':'dark', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor':'#3b82f6','primaryTextColor':'#fff','primaryBorderColor':'#60a5fa','lineColor':'#60a5fa'}}}%% graph LR A[Phase 1
Viral Growth

Phase 1
Viral Growth
Months 1-6
✓ Free tier + social
✓ $5K scholarship loop
✓ 3 pilot clubs
Target: 1K athletes
Revenue: First $5K MRR
Phase 2
Partnerships
Months 7-12
✓ Coach partnerships
✓ Club team deals
✓ Multi-sport launch
Target: 10K athletes
Revenue: $100K MRR

✓ High school partners
✓ Athletic depts
✓ Tournament streaming
Target: 50K athletes
Revenue: Series A ready
--- layout: default --- # 18-Month Roadmap ## Clear Path to Series A Readiness ```mermaid %%{init: {'theme':'dark', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor':'#3b82f6','primaryTextColor':'#fff','primaryBorderColor':'#60a5fa'}}}%% gantt title 18-Month Growth Timeline dateFormat YYYY-MM section Q3-Q4 2025 Launch & Learn :a1, 2025-07, 6M 1K Athletes :milestone, 2025-12, 0d section Q1-Q2 2026 Scale & Expand :a2, 2026-01, 6M 10K Athletes :milestone, 2026-06, 0d section Q3-Q4 2026 Institutional Growth :a3, 2026-07, 6M 50K Athletes :milestone, 2026-12, 0d Series A Ready :crit, milestone, 2026-12, 0d ```
### Q3-Q4 2025: Launch & Learn **Objective:** Validate product-market fit **Key Milestones:** - ✓ AI Recruiting Assistant (complete) - ✓ Technical infrastructure tested - ✓ Volleyball AI models deployed - ✓ Launch with 3 pilot clubs - ✓ 1,000 athletes onboarded - ✓ First 50 recruiting programs **Metrics by End Q4:** - 1,000 MAU athletes - 50 recruiting programs - 40% MoM organic growth
### Q1-Q2 2026: Scale & Expand **Objective:** Prove model repeatable **Key Milestones:** - ✓ Scale to 10,000 athlete profiles - ✓ Launch basketball and football - ✓ 100+ paid college programs - ✓ Influencer partnership program - ✓ Hit $500K+ ARR - ✓ Coach NPS: 40+ **Metrics by End Q2:** - 10,000 MAU athletes - 500 recruiting programs - 1,000 coaches MAU - $100K MRR - LTV/CAC ratio: 3-5x
### Q3-Q4 2026: Series A Ready **Objective:** Achieve product-market fit **Key Milestones:** - ✓ 50,000 athlete profiles (5 sports) - ✓ 500+ high school partnerships - ✓ 50+ university athletic depts - ✓ 5,000+ coaches MAU - ✓ Proven unit economics - ✓ $2-3M ARR **Metrics by End Q4:** - 50,000 MAU athletes - 1,000+ recruiting programs - $250K+ MRR - Net revenue retention: 120%+ - **Series A ready: $5-10M**
--- layout: default --- # Use of Funds ## $1.5M Strategic Deployment
### Allocation Summary
Product Development
Engineering, AI/ML, infrastructure
$750K
50%
Marketing & Growth
Influencer partnerships, paid ads
$450K
30%
Operations & Team
Salaries, hiring, recruiting
$225K
15%
Legal & Compliance
Child safety, NCAA compliance
$75K
5%
### Detailed Breakdown **Product Development ($750K)** - Engineering Team (4 hires): $400K - AI/ML Development: $200K - Cloud Infrastructure & Tools: $100K - 3rd Party Integrations: $50K **Marketing & Growth ($450K)** - Influencer Partnerships: $200K - Paid Acquisition: $150K - Events & Sponsorships: $70K - Content & Marketing: $30K **Operations & Team ($225K)** - Salaries & Recruiting: $150K - Office & Admin: $40K - Team Events & Culture: $35K **Legal & Compliance ($75K)** - Legal & Regulatory: $40K - Child Safety Compliance: $25K - Working Capital: $10K
Monthly Burn
$83K
Runway
18 months
Revenue Ramp
$0 → $250K/mo
--- layout: default --- # Market Opportunity ## $1B+ Market Waiting to Be Disrupted
$4.7B
Total Addressable Market
15.7M
Youth Athletes
$300/year avg spend
39M
Families
Multi-sided revenue
20K
Coaches
$50/month premium
Starting with volleyball & basketball
$500M Serviceable Market Year 1
--- layout: default --- # Risks & Mitigations ## We've Identified Key Risks and Have Strategies
⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA
Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits
⚠️ NCAA Compliance
NCAA rules change frequently; could enable violations
Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation
⚠️ Coach Adoption Challenges
Coaches conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantify time savings, flexible pricing
⚠️ Data Security
Athlete profiles contain sensitive data
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II (Year 1), security audits, user-controlled privacy
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Fairness constraints, regular bias audits, transparent outputs, feedback mechanism
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable at critical mass (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship loop, niche start (volleyball), geographic clustering
Risk Management: Critical risks identified with mitigation strategies built into product roadmap and budget
--- layout: default --- # Competitive Landscape ## Why We Win: AI-Native in Legacy Market
### Direct Competitors
NCSA (Largest Player)
  • • Founded 1997 (20+ years old)
  • • 2M athletes, 10K coaches
  • • Revenue: ~$100M+ (estimated)
  • • AI: Basic chat (recently tacked on)
  • • Weakness: Legacy architecture, recently sold
FieldLevel
  • • Founded 2015 (10 years old)
  • • 1M athletes, 5K coaches
  • • Revenue: $10-20M (estimated)
  • • Weakness: No AI, no livestreaming
SportsRecruits
  • • Founded 2008
  • • 500K athletes
  • • Weakness: Acquired by NCSA in 2024
### Why We Win
1. AI-Native Architecture
Built 2025 with AI at core vs. retrofitting. Better product, faster iteration, defensible tech.
2. Livestreaming Moat
One-tap livestreaming creates unique network effects. Competitors have no livestreaming.
3. Social Layer
Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth.
4. Founder-Market Fit
Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability.
5. Timing
NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.
"By the time incumbents respond (1-2 years), we'll have network effects, coach adoption, and athlete habit locked in."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # The Ask ## Join Us in Democratizing College Recruiting
$1.5M
SAFE at $10M cap
What $1.5M Gets You
✓ MVP across 3 sports
✓ 10K+ athletes onboarded
✓ $100K+ MRR achieved
✓ 6-8 core team hired
✓ Series A ready Q4 2026
18-Month Milestones
Q3-Q4 2025: 1K athletes
Q1-Q2 2026: 10K athletes
Q3-Q4 2026: 50K athletes
→ $5-10M Series A
"Every athlete deserves to be discovered. We're building the platform that makes it happen."
--- layout: center class: text-center ---
Why This Matters
15.7M
youth athletes deserve opportunity
39M
families deserve clarity
20K
coaches deserve efficiency
Athlead is the platform that makes it happen.
Closing Statement
"We're not just building software. We're transforming an industry that's been broken for 20 years. The market is ready. The technology is ready. We're ready. Let's go build something special."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # Thank You
Questions?
### Contact **Corey Young** - CEO & Co-Founder Former fintech founder, AI expert **Karen Young** - CMO & Co-Founder 20+ years youth sports, 3 generations of D1 athletes
### Key Metrics to Remember - **TAM:** $4.7B - **Raising:** $1.5M SAFE at $10M cap - **Runway:** 18 months - **Target CAC:** $15 - **Target LTV/CAC:** 5-10x - **Series A Target:** Q4 2026, $5-10M

--- layout: default --- # Risks & Mitigations ## We've Identified Key Risks and Have Strategies
⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA
Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits
⚠️ NCAA Compliance
NCAA rules change frequently; could enable violations
Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation
⚠️ Coach Adoption Challenges
Coaches conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantify time savings, flexible pricing
⚠️ Data Security
Athlete profiles contain sensitive data
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II (Year 1), security audits, user-controlled privacy
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Fairness constraints, regular bias audits, transparent outputs, feedback mechanism
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable at critical mass (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship loop, niche start (volleyball), geographic clustering

Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth.

Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability.
5. Timing
NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.

Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits

Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation

### Direct Competitors
NCSA (Largest Player)
  • • Founded 1997 (20+ years old)
  • • 2M athletes, 10K coaches
  • • Revenue: ~$100M+ (estimated)

  • • Weakness: Legacy architecture, recently sold

  • • 1M athletes, 5K coaches
  • • Revenue: $10-20M (estimated)
  • • Weakness: No AI, no livestreaming
SportsRecruits
  • • Founded 2008
  • • 500K athletes
  • • Weakness: Acquired by NCSA in 2024
### Why We Win
1. AI-Native Architecture
Built 2025 with AI at core vs. retrofitting. Better product, faster iteration, defensible tech.
2. Livestreaming Moat
One-tap livestreaming creates unique network effects. Competitors have no livestreaming.
3. Social Layer
Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth.
4. Founder-Market Fit
Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability.
5. Timing
NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.
"By the time incumbents respond (1-2 years), we'll have network effects, coach adoption, and athlete habit locked in."

⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA
Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits
⚠️ NCAA Compliance
NCAA rules change frequently; could enable violations
Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation
⚠️ Coach Adoption Challenges
Coaches conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantify time savings, flexible pricing

Athlete profiles contain sensitive data
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II (Year 1), security audits, user-controlled privacy
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Fairness constraints, regular bias audits, transparent outputs, feedback mechanism
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable at critical mass (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship loop, niche start (volleyball), geographic clustering

⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA
Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits
⚠️ NCAA Compliance
NCAA rules change frequently; could enable violations
Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation
⚠️ Coach Adoption Challenges
Coaches conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantify time savings, flexible pricing
⚠️ Data Security
Athlete profiles contain sensitive data
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II (Year 1), security audits, user-controlled privacy
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Fairness constraints, regular bias audits, transparent outputs, feedback mechanism
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable at critical mass (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship loop, niche start (volleyball), geographic clustering

Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability.

NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.

content.thinking: Perfect! Everything is done. Let me provide a summary to the user about what was implemented.

content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully applied the animated gradient background pattern to your Slidev presentation. Here's what I implemented:

## What Was Done

### 1. **Created AnimatedBackground.vue Component**
   - Location: `athlead-slidev-v2/components/AnimatedBackground.vue`
   - Customized with Athlead's brand colors:
     - Blue gradients: `#3b82f6`, `#2563eb`, `#1e40af`, `#1e3a8a`
     - Purple accents: `#8b5cf6`, `#6366f1`
   - Features 3 overlapping gradient layers with organic morphing shapes
   - Each slide generates unique random polygon shapes for smooth transitions

### 2. **Created Custom Layouts**
   - `layouts/default.vue` - For standard slides
   - `layouts/cover.vue` - For cover/title slides
   - `layouts/center.vue` - For centered content slides
   - All layouts include the AnimatedBackground component

### 3. **Cleaned Up slides.md**
   - Removed all inline gradient style blocks (13 total)
   - Removed static background gradient from global styles
   - The animated background now handles all backgrounds dynamically

### 4. **How It Works**
   - Each slide transition creates a smooth morphing effect
   - The background uses 3 layered gradients with different clip-path polygons
   - 70px blur creates the soft, glowing effect
   - Seeded random generation ensures consistent shapes per slide
   - 0.8s transition with cubic-bezier easing for smooth animations

## View the Results

The dev server is now running at **http://localhost:3031/**

Navigate through the slides using arrow keys to see the beautiful animated gradient transitions - each slide will have a unique organic blob pattern that smoothly morphs into the next!

The backgrounds will now flow and morph between slides instead of being static, creating a much more dynamic and engaging presentation experience.

content.text:
Perfect! I've fixed the issue. The problem was that the `style.css` file had a white background rule that was covering the animated gradient. Here's what I fixed:

## Changes Made

### 1. **Removed White Background** (style.css:33-43)
   - Changed `.slidev-layout` background from `white` to `transparent`
   - Added proper z-index positioning for content layers

### 2. **Updated Typography for Dark Background**
   - H1: Changed to white
   - H2: Changed to light blue (`#60a5fa`)
   - H3: Changed to white
   - Paragraphs: Changed to white with 90% opacity
   - All text elements now optimized for dark gradient background

### 3. **Updated All Color Elements**
   - Tables: Semi-transparent borders and white text
   - Links: Light blue color (`#60a5fa`)
   - Code blocks: Semi-transparent background with light blue text
   - Strong/bold text: Light blue color
   - Quotes/emphasis: White with 80% opacity
   - Cards: Semi-transparent with backdrop blur effect

### 4. **Fixed Component Z-Index** (AnimatedBackground.vue:75)
   - Changed z-index from -1 to 0 for proper layering

Now **refresh your browser** with a hard refresh (Cmd+Shift+R or Ctrl+Shift+R) and you should see:
- ✅ Beautiful animated gradient backgrounds on every slide
- ✅ Smooth morphing transitions between slides
- ✅ All content visible and readable on the dark gradient
- ✅ Proper text colors optimized for dark backgrounds

The animated gradient will now stay visible and morph smoothly as you navigate through the slides!

content.text:
Perfect! Now refresh your browser (Cmd+Shift+R / Ctrl+Shift+R) and you should see:

## What I Changed:

1. **Reduced Gradient Opacity Dramatically**
   - Layer 1: 0.4 → 0.12 (70% reduction)
   - Layer 2: 0.4 → 0.1 (75% reduction)  
   - Layer 3: 0.3 → 0.08 (73% reduction)

2. **Lightened Gradient Colors**
   - Changed to lighter blue tones (`#60a5fa` instead of `#1e40af`)
   - Removed the very dark navy colors

3. **Increased Blur Slightly**
   - 70px → 80px for an even softer, more diffused effect

4. **Kept Dark Background Base**
   - Using `#0a1628` (dark blue-black) as the base

The gradient is now **much more subtle** - just a hint of organic animated shapes in the background that morphs between slides, rather than dominating the entire slide. This matches the example you showed where the gradient is barely noticeable but adds a nice dynamic touch.

The text will remain clearly visible and the background won't overpower your content!
